q: his first paid endorsement deal Wednesday since pleading guilty to dog fighting charges. Unequal would not comment on what the deal was worth, and Michael Vick Vicks representatives weren't immediately available for comment. I'm thrilled to be a part of the Unequal team, Michael Vick said in a press release announcing the agreement. Michael Vick began wearing Unequal apparel after suffering a rib injury against the Washington Redskins early in the 2010-2011 season, the release said. Unequal President

House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. Mr. President Bush finally asked for Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's resignation two years later, in November 2006. That group was looking for a candidate who has a sterling fiscally conservative record-a characteristic missing from many in a field scarred by support for earmarks or votes for bailouts. There's a real void for a Club for Growth kind of candidate, an ideologically conservative candidate on fiscal issues, and Mike Pence was the closest there was to actually running, said Terry Sullivan, a longtime GOP consultant in South Carolina who has worked for Sen. Jim DeMint . Sen. Jim DeMint , who is close to Mike Pence , is adamant that he won't run for president-despite a visit to Iowa

. Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities.
